SEARCH
Package com.myfinanceapp.ui.common

Class AnimationUtils

java.lang.Object
com.myfinanceapp.ui.common.AnimationUtils
public class AnimationUtils extends Object
Utility class providing elegant scene transition animations. Includes various transition effects such as fade, slide, scale, and more.
Version:
4.0
Author:
SE_Group110
